title: Find Ratios of Consecutive Terms
text: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.
speech: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.
pacedSpeech: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.

title: Ratio Between $$7$$ and $$21$$
text: What is the common ratio between $$7$$ and 21? Effectively, what is $$\frac{21}{7}$$?
speech: What is the common ratio between , 7  and 21? Effectively, what is  21 over 7 ?
pacedSpeech: What is the common ratio between  , 7

title: Ratio Between $$567$$ and $$1701$$

hintAnswer: Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=3$$.
title: Determining Commonality in Ratios
text: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
choices: Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=3$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=4$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=\frac{1}{4}$$.
No, the series is not geometric.
speech: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
pacedSpeech: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
